callouts.name: Immersive Sound
callouts.description: A 960-watt, 22-speaker audio system with Road Noise Active Noise Cancellation provides an immersive listening experience and studio-quality sound.

callouts.name: Stay Connected
callouts.description: Instantly connect your devices with Bluetooth supporting multiple simultaneous connections, or quickly charge your devices by taking advantage of the 36W wireless and USB-C charging.

callouts.name: Elegant Style
callouts.description: Iconic lines combined with elegant modern proportions.

traveldesc: With an estimated range of up to 634 kilometers and access to the world's largest and most powerful fast-charging network, you'll spend less time charging and more time on the road.
subject: Subject

question1.question: CAN MY GARAGE WELCOME ME SAFELY?
question1.answer: Yes, the safety of our customers and our teams is our priority. We have taken reinforced sanitary measures with our network and established strict protocols in order to welcome you or to intervene on your vehicle in complete safety.

question2.question: WHAT ARE THE OPERATIONS THAT I CAN PERFORM IN THE WORKSHOP?
question2.answer: All. With each intervention or interview, you benefit from the professionalism of our teams and 20 checkpoints.

question3.question: WHAT SERVICES ARE AVAILABLE?
question3.answer: All. Our teams and sales advisers welcome you to help you discover or try out our range of vehicles and our new products while respecting barrier gestures and sanitary distances.Do not hesitate to use all the means of contact made available to you to send us your requests or to make an appointment for a trial by consulting our current offers.

question4.question: HOW DOES A TRIAL CONDUCT?
question4.answer: The necessary documents, such as a copy of your driving licence, must be sent to us beforehand in order to avoid any physical contact.The vehicle concerned remained without contact for 3 hours and was completely disinfected. Before the test, the protective kit is removed, wearing a mask is compulsory inside the vehicle. The employee will ask you to wash your hands.Only the customer and the employee can get into the vehicle. The customer gets in the front and drives the vehicle, the employee gets in the right rear.

question5.question: HOW DOES THE DELIVERY OF MY VEHICLE HAPPEN?
question5.answer: The number of daily deliveries is limited in order to regulate attendance at the point of sale. You will be the only customer in the delivery space. Safety distances will be respected. Your interlocutor will be equipped with a mask. Necessary documents prepared in advance and we ask that you bring your own pen.Your vehicle will have been prepared and disinfected at least 24 hours before the keys are handed over.Some points of sale may offer to deliver your vehicle to your home, free of charge and without contact. In this context, your vehicle will be disinfected again once on site.

question6.question: DOES A TRIAL COMMIT ME TO BUY?
question6.answer: A test drive absolutely does not commit you to the purchase of a vehicle.

question7.question: CAN A HYBRID CAR RUN WITHOUT PETROL?
question7.answer: No, that's not possible.A hybrid car continues to drive even when its traction battery is discharged, thanks to the internal combustion engine.

question8.question: I HAVE QUESTIONS CONCERNING MY FINANCING/RENTAL AGREEMENT?
question8.answer: All the information of your contract is available on your Customer Area.

infop2: Take your place aboard the Green X. Its latest-generation driving position and dynamic front seats take you to new sensations.
i1: Enjoy and discover exclusively our new ecological model.
i7: Easy to charge, extraordinarily pleasant to drive, our 100% electric models combine environmentally friendly energy, exceptional driving precision, quality finishes, and dynamic design.
i9: Fifteen years of research have led to the development of an electric motor that emits no CO2. Our goal is to make the world a cleaner place, while giving your mobility unparalleled luxury and character. As you master an ultra-advanced engine, the world becomes a cleaner place.
i10: Thanks to our GREEN models, combine power and ecology. You can now choose to change the world.
i18: Don't miss any offers for all our models.
i21: Don't miss out and subscribe to our Newsletter to stay informed about all our promotional offers.
